amendment.description: Amendment increases the appropriation (by offset) to the International Trade Administration by $500,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in the Congressional Record to increase the appropriation to the International Trade Administration by $500,000 and to decrease the appropriation for the Bureau of the Census by $500,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schock amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Mr. Westmoreland demanded a separate vote on the Schock amendment (A002).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schock amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 236 (Roll no. 386).
